name: Parallel Routes
description: Render multiple sections of a page in parallel
cons: More complex routing;Not suitable for all layouts

name: Route Groups
description: Organize routes without affecting URL paths
pros: Logical file organization;Shared layouts;No URL impact

name: Compound Components
description: Build components that share state implicitly

name: Render Props
description: Share code between components using render prop

name: Custom Hooks
description: Extract component logic into reusable hooks

name: Provide/Inject
cons: Not reactive by default;Harder to track

name: Scoped Slots
description: Pass template from parent to child

name: Composables
Load Function
cons: Only runs on server;No client state

name: Form Actions
Error Boundaries
pros: Nested error handling;Keep context;No app crash

name: Root Route
description: Single source of truth for layout
pros: Single layout entry;Providers in one place
